full_text: i chose michigan because it covers everything culture and academics and obviously the facilities here you see are perfect and and you know the coaches were really great to me so i thought it was just a perfect fit i started playing hockey i guess when i think four years old just yeah i grew up playing in bc there and in bantam our team had a little tournament at penn state and that was kind of some big exposure for me for how cool the big ten is and i just thought like wow this is a this is an awesome conference it'd be really cool to play in and then yeah it was a definitely kind of helped me expose me to the college row i'm a highly skilled offensive player who uh made creative plays and uh help create scoring chances with the puck in the net power nearly shoveled it in past brady and then on the rebound it comes back out to kent johnson who pokes at home and it's another fast start for michigan i just love hockey because it's so fun to to make plays and win and uh scoring goals and i just think there's a such a fast-paced game and so much room for skill and i just love that
